#summary of the package

The pachake includes the following classes:

 # Bessel 
 # ESfield 
 # GridCart1D 
 # Maxwellian 
 # Output 
 # RelParsek
 # RelSpecies
 # SimulationStep
 # Solver 
 # Timer  

A web site with the details of the packages is included in the installation, in the directory doc. Just click on index.html under the doc folder.
